channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump calls Sen. Van Hollen a 'fool' after meeting with deported MS-13 suspect in El Salvador
item.description: President Donald Trump is calling Sen. Chris Van Hollen a "fool" after the Maryland Democrat flew to El Salvador to meet with Kilmar Abrego Garcia.

item.title: Top GOP senator calls out Code Pink, The People’s Forum allegedly pushing CCP propaganda in US
item.description: Sen. Charles Grassley, R-Iowa, is asking the Department of Justice to look into whether two left-wing groups should have to register under FARA.

item.title: Last Of Us Season Premiere Punctures The Obnoxious Girlboss Trope
item.description: The new season of 'The Last of Us' doesn’t coddle or lionize teenage girls but instead depicts them in all their obnoxious glory.
